text: Rodolfo Vera Quizon Sr. (July 25, 1928 – July 10, 2012), better known by his stage name Dolphy, was a Filipino comedian and actor. He is widely regarded as the country's King of Comedy for his comedic talent embodied by his long roster of works on stage, radio, television and movies.Avendaño, Christine O. (November 9, 2010).
